entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 early in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
